channel.title: I need a noob-proof tutorial!
channel.description: Well, I am looking for a tutorial on how to run scar scripts, to someone who has only seen scar for like 1 minute and from scratch. Like, window settings, what to do with scripts, etc. Everytime I run a script, my cursor goes crazy and likes restarts my computer, or close all the window, or ends up opening up like Microsoft Word. Any help would be appreciated.

item.title: I need a noob-proof tutorial!
item.dc:creator: @Reaver Reaver
item.description:
@Reaver wrote:

It’s called Boredom. In fact, it’s actually called Pking. I barely use my main, I just want some sweet pkers.

That and buisness is slow when you’re self employed. In addition to the other things I do I end up with too much free time, for example my current plans are;

Restoring a Morris.
Building a Dune Buggy.
Playing RS
Work
Drinking
Smoking
Making a ZORB slingshot.
Making a death luge
Pubcrawling Airbrush Tattooing.

FREE TIME.

UPDATE

Screwed around with it, think I got it working. Will update when I do.[br][size=1]Posted at: March 17, 2006, 06:46:12 am[/size][hr]K, worked it out.

Upload your script, for me I’m using Essence Miner Final.

Do all the pre-req, like Rune Mysteries.

Now load up the script, the one I use doesn’t need to pick colours so it’s useful.

Drag the crosshair icon onto Moparscape.

Use the run shortcut or run button.

If you have done this and all above, then yay?

Read full topic

item.title: I need a noob-proof tutorial!

item.description:
@Arkanor wrote:

What on earth is a CompTech doing playing Runescape?

item.title: I need a noob-proof tutorial!
item.dc:creator: @Reaver Reaver
item.description:
@Reaver wrote:

Mn… I hate to say this but I think Bumfluff’s advice doesn’t work.

Example

I’m a computer technician, I work with hardware, and drivers mainly. Occasionally Malware and Spyware. When it comes to Scar, I’m drawing blanks.

What he, and I, most likely want is an In-Depth noob proof guide on how to use it for, say, training on Chickens. Nei?

Read full topic

item.title: I need a noob-proof tutorial!
item.dc:creator: @bumfluff120 bumfluff120
item.description:
@bumfluff120 wrote:

It took me a while to understand too, and it’s sort of hard to explain. But don’t worry, one day it will just come to you.

Read full topic

item.title: I need a noob-proof tutorial!
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

If you need to select colours, pick the colorpicker and click the color.

Read full topic

item.title: I need a noob-proof tutorial!
item.dc:creator: @Arkanor Arkanor
item.description:
@Arkanor wrote:

Ahh. You need to select the client window by dragging the crosshairs onto the applet (for runescape).

Turn silent mouse off, paste script into SCAR, select client window, and press Ctrl + Alt + R. That’s about all that I do.

Read full topic
